text: If people want to look on Twitter, there's a a writer called Nicholas Shakespeare who's just written a very good book on Ian Fleming, But who absolutely specializes in brutal takedowns of Boris Johnson and has collected The greatest articles written on Boris Johnson over the last few days, and he picks out, Anthony Seldon in The Times, who says his inner emptiness made it imperative to be the center of attention.
